ValidationRule.description: When the "Lock Logistics Financials" checkbox on an Event is checked, all fields within the Logistics Financials are locked except for "Next Year Budget" field. To make the fields editable again, go to Event and click "Unlock Logistics Financials" button.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
NOT(ISNEW()), /* Allows record creation */
Event__r.Lock_Logistics_Financials__c = TRUE,
OR(
ISCHANGED(Category__c),
ISCHANGED(Budget__c),
ISCHANGED(Estimated_Cost__c),
ISCHANGED(Actual_Cost__c),
ISCHANGED(Notes__c),
ISCHANGED(Estimated_Cost_History__c),
ISCHANGED(Observations__c),
ISCHANGED(Last_Year_Actual__c)
)
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Event's Logistics Financials have been locked by Finance. Please reach out to Jennifer Brenner to unlock.
